title: Joe Biden’s Declining FAST | 8/6/20
description:
Joe Biden asked a black reporter if he’s a cocaine junkie when asked if he would take a cognitive test. Can the Democrats hide Biden until November or will he have to debate Trump? Portland has seen riots for about 70 consecutive days. Can we please stop categorizing people by skin color? The Left has abandoned Dr. Birx, claiming she sides too much with Trump. Whether on coronavirus or climate change, Democrats only listen to the experts that agree with them. Dr. Fauci has some interesting takes on the coronavirus spike in the U.S. and who may be to blame for the testing delay. Pac-12 football players made a list of demands that must be met for them to play, including getting 50% of the revenue and ending racism.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
